title: Let's talk about vayne.
body:
Being realistic -3 AD is going to do nothing. Vayne needs 3 aa's to kill you, so that's 9 AD less damage she does, now how many times have you escaped a fight from vayne with 9 or less HP? Not very often I bet, and it doesnt make farming much different for her either. But instead of just saying "uhhh dat didn't work duhhh" let's think of some ideas that will work.

I think the most OP thing about her is her passive, the true damage is brutal yes but we all know to run as soon as we get those silver rings, but it's her passive that makes running impossible.

So I think a nerf to the passive is in order. 

Another option is to give her silver bolts a mana cost, every 3 stacks automatically takes 20 mana from her on the 3rd Attack, this would make it a togge ability instead of a passive, and because you need to turn it on/off it makes 1 more button to press when she fights (just like all the rest of us) this would be similar to Muramana's toggle ability.

Her knock back seems to override other dashes, for example if a Lee Sin uses Q to dash to her, if she fires her knock back at him while he is in mid flight he will be knocked back the full distance and not finish his dash, or do the damage. 
Perhaps it could be adjusted so that it can't hit midair targets. 

Another option is to make her true damage do a flat amount instead of %HP damage 


What are some ideas you guys can think of?

replies.body: She just has too much 1v1 potential for an AD carry, period.
Don't 1v1 her.
Sure, don't. BUT SHE'S AN ADC, you shouldn't be scared of 1v1ing her.

you should be scared of 1v1ing any adc lol.

It's sad that most champs can 1v1 the adc.

vayne is very very strong. I cant imagine a situation where many other ADCs could realistically 1v5 a whole team. Graves has OK mobility but he'd be pinned down eventually. Jinx could be expected to lock down 2 or 3 with chompers and wail in the rest of the team. Siv would get eaten for breakfast 1v5.

Every other ADC has some sort of limit to the kite potential and mobility / invisibility. But vayne has very good access to both.

As i recall, no offence but you're bronze. Jinx is stronger than Vayne in every way, stronger lategame AOE crits, stronger laning. Vayne is a 500range champ jinx is 10x that, positioning with jinx-kun is 10x easier and safer. A Vayne can only 1v5 unreliable CC, where jinx could stay out of range of all the CC to begin with.
yeah fair nuff.  From the bronze perspective maybe vayne just takes better advantage of that ELO. Probably why siv is a weaker pick in bronze but a favoured pick up top.
I'm silver and Jinx smokes Vayne in every aspect.
Must be a bronze thing then.
Hmm yeah lets absolutely destroy a champion. Lets take  all of her strengths and her kit... and just delete it all but keep her in the game for those people who love surrendering at 20. Shut up.
no the only way to fix her it to buff her passive and then nerf all other champs move speed like we all know this
That's generous of you, Why let other champs even have movespeed at all?
that's what I was thinking

Vayne doesn't need a nerf.

She has poor laning which people at low elo don't know how to punish, and 2 item counters which no1 seems to buy (upgraded sweeping lense/pinkward) Git Gud. stop complaining Vayne is balanced.

Otherwise, enjoy playing all the other adcs that do no damage to tanks.. FUN

I find it funny how many dumbnut tanks don't realize {{item:3143}} is the biggest ever damn item counter (other than pink or sweeper) to vayne, it lowers her mobility, it lowers her attackspeed, it lowers her normal damage, it lowers her crit damage
and stack that with a {{item:3110}} and GG.

Except the problem with all of these, is that they also screw on her late game, which is the thing Riot is actually trying to avoid.

And believe it or not 3 AD is still significant.

ikr, it stuffs her lanign phase up so hard, its like a viktor trying to last hit 100% cs with only aa, you cant do it with one of the lowest base ad in game (lowest ad is 48, vayne is now only 2 above that) this 3 is actually a massive nerf to her laning
I played Vayne yesterday and one person was like. Vayne got nerfed and I was like...HAHAHHA. WHAT NERF. 3 LESS AD? OKAY. IF YOU CALL THAT A NERF. HAHAHHAHA.
